column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.3

#Text=## Multi-granular Legal Topic Classification on Greek Legislation
#Text=
#Text=Code and data repo for the paper: [Multi-granular Legal Topic Classification on Greek Legislation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2109.15298)\\
#Text=presented at NLLP 2021 workshop co-located with EMNLP 2021.
#Text=Dataset is available at HuggingFace ðŸ¤—: https://huggingface.co/datasets/greek_legal_code
#Text=
#Text=***
#Text=### Abstract
#Text=
#Text=In this work, we study the task of classifying legal texts written in the Greek language.
#Text=We introduce and make publicly available a novel dataset based on Greek
#Text=legislation, consisting of more than 47 thousand official, categorized Greek legislation resources.
#Text=We experiment with this dataset and evaluate a battery of
#Text=advanced methods and classifiers, ranging from traditional machine learning and RNN-based methods to state-of-the-art Transformer-based methods.
#Text=We show that recurrent architectures with domain-specific word embeddings offer improved overall performance while being competitive even to transformer-based
#Text=models.
#Text=Finally, we show that cutting-edge multilingual and monolingual transformer-based models brawl on the top of the classifiersâ€™ ranking, making us question
#Text=the necessity of training monolingual transfer learning models as a rule of thumb.
#Text=To the best of our knowledge, this is the first time the task of Greek legal text classification is considered in an open research project, while also Greek is a
#Text=language with very limited NLP resources in general.
#Text=
#Text=***
#Text=### Code
#Text=
#Text=Contact me via email for code access.
#Text=Word2Vec embeddings available at: http://legislation.di.uoa.gr/publications/ner_word2vec
#Text=
#Text=**Note:**
#Text=NLP training scripts based on "Large-Scale Multi-Label Text Classification on EU Legislation" project.
#Text=For full code and project structure, follow lmtc-eurlex57k project instructions at: https://github.com/iliaschalkidis/lmtc-eurlex57k
